parameter.value:
<script type="text/javascript">
var belboonTag = {};
</script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://containertags.belboon.de/belboonTag.js.php?pId={{Belboon Retargeting Partner ID}}&page=start&type=dynamic"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var belboonTag = {"categoryId": "{{Category Name}}"};
</script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://containertags.belboon.de/belboonTag.js.php?pId={{Belboon Retargeting Partner ID}}&page=category&type=dynamic"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var belboonTag = {
"productBrand": "",
"categoryId": "",
"products": [
		{
			"id": "{{Product ID}}",
			"price": "{{Product Price}}",
		}]
};
</script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://containertags.belboon.de/belboonTag.js.php?pId={{Belboon Retargeting Partner ID}}&page=product&type=dynamic"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var cartProducts = {{Cart Products}};
var products = [];
for (var i=0; i<cartProducts.length; i++) {
  products.push({ "id" : cartProducts[i].id, "price" : cartProducts[i].price, "qty": cartProducts[i].quantity });
}

var belboonTag = {
	"orderProducts": products
};
</script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://containertags.belboon.de/belboonTag.js.php?pId={{Belboon Retargeting Partner ID}}&page=basket&type=dynamic"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var purchaseProducts = {{Purchase Products}};
var products = [];
for (var i=0; i<purchaseProducts.length; i++) {
  products.push({ "id" : purchaseProducts[i].id, "price" : purchaseProducts[i].price, "qty": purchaseProducts[i].quantity });
}

var belboonTag = {
	"orderProducts": products
};
</script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://containertags.belboon.de/belboonTag.js.php?pId={{Belboon Retargeting Partner ID}}&page=checkout&type=dynamic"></script>
